quotes.message: Pure mathematics is on the whole distinctly more useful than applied. For what is useful above all is technique, and mathematical technique is taught mainly through pure mathematics.
quotes.name: G. H. Hardy

quotes.message: Mathematics is as much an aspect of culture as it is a collection of algorithms.
quotes.name: Carl Boyer

quotes.message: Mathematics is a game played according to certain simple rules with meaningless marks on paper.
quotes.name: David Hilbert

quotes.message: You can not apply mathematics as long as words still becloud reality.
quotes.name: Hermann Weyl

quotes.message: Mathematics is the tool specially suited for dealing with abstract concepts of any kind and there is no limit to its power in this field.
quotes.name: P. Dirac.

quotes.message: The power of mathematics is often to change one thing into another, to change geometry into language.
quotes.name: Marcus Du Sautoy

quotes.message: Mathematics is the gate and key to science.
quotes.name: Roger Bacon

quotes.message: God used beautiful mathematics in creating the world.
quotes.name: Paul Dirac

quotes.message: Mathematics is a game played according to certain rules with meaningless marks on paper.
quotes.name: David Hilbert

quotes.message: Mathematics is written for mathematicians.
quotes.name: Nicolaus Copernicus

quotes.message: The science of pure mathematics, in its modern developments, may claim to be the most original creation of the human spirit.
quotes.name: Alfred North Whitehead

quotes.message: The most painful thing about mathematics is how far away you are from being able to use it after you have learned it.
quotes.name: James Newman

quotes.message: Mathematics is concerned only with the enumeration and comparison of relations.
quotes.name: Carl Friedrich Gauss

quotes.message: Mathematics cannot handle physical quantities like density that literally go to infinity.
quotes.name: Gregory Benford

quotes.message: The art of doing mathematics consists in finding that special case which contains all the germs of generality.
quotes.name: David Hilbert

quotes.message: Mathematics allows for no hypocrisy and no vagueness.
quotes.name: Stendhal

quotes.message: Mathematics is as old as Man.
quotes.name: Stefan Banach

quotes.message: Thus, in a sense, mathematics has been most advanced by those who distinguished themselves by intuition rather than by rigorous proofs.
quotes.name: Felix Klein

quotes.message: What is best in mathematics deserves not merely to be learned as a task but to be assimilated as a part of daily thought, and brought again and again before the mind with ever-renewed encouragement.
quotes.name: Bertrand Russell

quotes.message: Mathematics, rightly viewed, possesses not only truth, but supreme beauty.
quotes.name: Bertrand Russell

quotes.message: For the things of this world cannot be made known without a knowledge of mathematics.
quotes.name: Roger Bacon

quotes.message: You do not study mathematics because it helps you build a bridge. You study mathematics because it is the poetry of the universe. Its beauty transcends mere things.
quotes.name: Johnathan David Farley

quotes.message: Mathematics may be defined as the subject in which we never know what we are talking about, nor whether what we are saying is true.
quotes.name: Bertrand Russell

quotes.message: Mathematics is a place where you can do things which you can't do in the real world.
quotes.name: Marcus Du Sautoy

quotes.message: Without mathematics, there's nothing you can do. Everything around you is mathematics. Everything around you is numbers.
quotes.name: Shakuntala Devi

quotes.message: Mathematics takes us into the region of absolute necessity, to which not only the actual word, but every possible word, must conform.
quotes.name: Bertrand Russell

quotes.message: Mathematics has beauty and romance. It's not a boring place to be, the mathematical world. It's an extraordinary place; it's worth spending time there.
quotes.name: Marcus Du Sautoy

quotes.message: Logic and mathematics are nothing but specialised linguistic structures.
quotes.name: Jean Piaget

quotes.message: One of the most amazing things about mathematics is the people who do math aren't usually interested in application, because mathematics itself is truly a beautiful art form. It's structures and patterns, and that's what we love, and that's what we get off on.
quotes.name: Danica Mckellar

quotes.message: Mathematics is, as it were, a sensuous logic, and relates to philosophy as do the arts, music, and plastic art to poetry.
quotes.name: Karl Wilhelm Friedrich Schlegel

quotes.message: All mathematics is is a language that is well tuned, finely honed, to describe patterns; be it patterns in a star, which has five points that are regularly arranged, be it patterns in numbers like 2, 4, 6, 8, 10 that follow very regular progression.
quotes.name: Brian Greene

quotes.message: The abstract analysis of the world by mathematics and physics rests on the concepts of space and time.
quotes.name: James J. Gibson

quotes.message: If a man's wit be wandering, let him study the mathematics.
quotes.name: Francis Bacon

quotes.message: Mathematics is the language with which God wrote the universe.
quotes.name: Galileo

quotes.message: Mathematics is the music of reason.
quotes.name: James Joseph Sylvester

quotes.message: Mathematics knows no races or geographic boundaries; for mathematics, the cultural world is one country.
quotes.name: David Hilbert

quotes.message: A lot of music is mathematics. It's balance.
quotes.name: Mel Brooks

quotes.message: Mathematics is the art of giving the same name to different things.
quotes.name: Henri Poincare

quotes.message: In mathematics the art of proposing a question must be held of higher value than solving it.
quotes.name: Georg Cantor

quotes.message: Mathematics consists in proving the most obvious thing in the least obvious way.
quotes.name: George Polya

quotes.message: The longer mathematics lives the more abstract - and therefore, possibly also the more practical - it becomes.
quotes.name: E. T. Bell

quotes.message: The essence of mathematics lies in its freedom.
quotes.name: Georg Cantor

quotes.message: Pure mathematics is, in its way, the poetry of logical ideas.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: Mathematics is the most beautiful and most powerful creation of the human spirit.
quotes.name: Stefan Banach

quotes.message: The study of mathematics, like the Nile, begins in minuteness but ends in magnificence.
quotes.name: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.message: Mathematics is the queen of science.
quotes.name: Carl Friedrich Gauss

quotes.message: Well, some mathematics problems look simple, and you try them for a year or so, and then you try them for a hundred years, and it turns out that they're extremely hard to solve.
quotes.name: Andrew Wiles

quotes.message: But mathematics is the sister, as well as the servant, of the arts and is touched by the same madness and genius.
quotes.name: Marston Morse
